sidebar.title: Develop • Deploy • Deliver
sidebar.paragraph: One Platform provides a single place for all internal applications and services, supports consistent User experience by providing standard platform for service hosting and data integration, efficient resource management, real time metrics availability, cross-team collaboration and unified documentation.

main.title: We connect users to an experience
main.paragraph: Application Hub is a platform that brings together all application to increase collaboration, improve execution and accelerate deployment and delivery speed.
